mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.source_Id AS sourceId, a.table_name AS tableName, a.category AS category, a.package_name AS packageName, a.module_name AS moduleName, a.function_name AS functionName, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag
